plot: In 1475 Stephen the Great ruler of Moldavia is preparing to face an invading Ottoman army of 120 000 men.The fate of Moldavia, of Eastern Europe and of East European Christianity largely depends on the outcome of this historical battle.
title: Stefan cel Mare
plot_es: In 1475 Stephen the Great ruler of Moldavia is preparing to face an invading Ottoman army of 120 000 men.The fate of Moldavia, of Eastern Europe and of East European Christianity largely depends on the outcome of this historical battle.
plot_en: In 1475 Stephen the Great ruler of Moldavia is preparing to face an invading Ottoman army of 120 000 men.The fate of Moldavia, of Eastern Europe and of East European Christianity largely depends on the outcome of this historical battle.

cast.role: Stefan cel Mare /              Stephen the Great
